program_name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description: The Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at UM6P provides comprehensive training in software development, algorithms, data structures, artificial intelligence, and cybersecurity. The program combines theoretical foundations with practical projects, preparing students for careers in technology companies, research institutions, and startups. Students benefit from modern facilities, industry partnerships, and a multicultural environment.

curriculum_overview.year_1: Fundamentals: Programming (Python, Java), Mathematics, Physics, Digital Systems
curriculum_overview.year_2: Core CS: Data Structures, Algorithms, Databases, Operating Systems, Computer Networks
curriculum_overview.year_3: Specialization: AI/Machine Learning, Cybersecurity, Software Engineering, Capstone Project

scholarship_details: Merit-based scholarships covering up to 50% of tuition fees. Need-based financial aid available.
notable_features: Strong industry partnerships with OCP Group, Microsoft, IBM
Research opportunities in AI and renewable energy
program_outcomes: Graduates will be able to design, implement, and analyze computer systems and software solutions. They will possess strong problem-solving skills, understanding of ethical and social implications of technology, and ability to work in multidisciplinary teams.
